Description: Philips Lighting North America Corp. agreed to pay a $2 million civil penalty to settle charges that the company knowingly failed to report information about a defect and an unreasonable risk of serious injury with EnergySaver compact fluorescent lamps.

Notes: Description field shows type of discrimination that EEOC had alleged.
